description: Kernite is a fairly common ore type that yields the largest amount of mexallon of any ore types in the world. Besides mexallon the Kernite also has a bit of tritanium and isogen. 400 units of ore are needed for refining.

The Navitas is a solid mining vessel, in wide use by independent excavators. It is also one of the best ships available for budding traders or even scavengers. The long-range scanners and sturdy outer shell of the ship help to protect the ship from harassment.

Special Ability: 5% bonus to cargo capacity and 20% bonus to mining laser yield per level. -60% mining laser capacitor use
